content.raw:
There is a subtlety in how sensors become `Active`. Take a look at `ContactSensor::IsActive`. This function will return true if there is a subscriber on `contactsPub`. 

In this PR, `contactsPub` is not created until `SetActive` is called.

We should create `contactsPub` on `Load`, and alter the logic the logic here to create the contact filters.
content.html:
There is a subtlety in how sensors become Active. Take a look at ContactSensor::IsActive. This function will return true if there is a subscriber on contactsPub.

In this PR, contactsPub is not created until SetActive is called.

We should create contactsPub on Load, and alter the logic the logic here to create the contact filters.
